StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetTotalContractsNWAs]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID as integer, @Ac.vityDate as date.me, @Ac.vityEndDate as date.me AS
SET NOCOUNT ON SET ArithAbort ON
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF (@Organiza.onID = 0 AND @Ac.vityDate IS NULL AND @Ac.vityEndDate IS NULL) BEGIN SELECT NULL AS ORGANIZATION_ID, NULL AS Recrui.ngOrgName, NULL AS ACTIVITY_TYPE, NULL AS ACTIVITY_COUNT WHERE 1 = 2 END ELSE BEGIN
DECLARE @Organiza.onType as Varchar(3)
SET @Organiza.onID = COALESCE(@Organiza.onID, 900) SET @Organiza.onType = (SELECT ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID)
DECLARE @OrgCount int SELECT @OrgCount = COUNT(*) FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[vwDecendentRecrui.ngOrgs] where parent = @Organiza.onID
CREATE TABLE #TempOrgList ( ORGANIZATION_ID int NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY )
IF @OrgCount = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO #TempOrgList SELECT @Organiza.onID AS ORGANIZATION_ID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO #TempOrgList SELECT Decendent AS ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[vwDecendentRecrui.ngOrgs] where parent = @Organiza.onID END
select so.ORGANIZATION_ID AS Org_ID ,ORGANIZATION_TYPE AS ORG_TYPE ,NAME AS LONG_NAME ,ISOPEN ,EFFECTIVE_DATE ,DateClosed INTO #SUBORGS FROM MCRISS.[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] so INNER JOIN #TempOrgList t ON t.ORGANIZATION_ID = so.ORGANIZATION_ID where SO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RSS' AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, SO.EFFECTIVE_DATE, @Ac.vityDate) >= 0 AND (SO.ISOPEN = 'Y' OR (SO.ISOPEN != 'Y' AND SO.DateClosed IS NOT NULL AND SO.DateClosed > @Ac.vityDate))
IF (SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(8), @Ac.vityEndDate, 108)) = '00:00:00' BEGIN SELECT @Ac.vityEndDate = DATEADD(MILLISECOND, -10, DATEADD(DAY, 1, @Ac.vityEndDate)) END
select n.NWA_ID, N.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INTO #Nwa from MCRISS.dbo.NWA n INNER JOIN #SUBORGS org ON org.ORG_ID = N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID WHERE DATEDIFF(DAY, @Ac.vityDate, N.NWA_DECLARED_DATE) >= 0 AND DATEDIFF(DAY, N.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, @Ac.vityEndDate) >= 0
--alter table #Nwa --Add primary key (Nwa_Id)
--CREATE Index cai_nwa_index ON #Nwa (ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID)
SELECT DISTINCT n.NWA_ID INTO #NwaZkc FROM #Nwa N INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA N_OLD ON N_OLD.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N_OLD.NWA_ID = (SELECT MAX(N2.NWA_ID) FROM NWA N2 WHERE N2.NWA_ID < N.Nwa_ID AND N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT C_OLD ON C_OLD.NWA_ID = N_OLD.NWA_ID WHERE C_OLD.DISCHARGE_CODE = 'ZKC' AND N_OLD.NWA_ID < N.Nwa_ID
-- Component Code is no longer excluded --DELETE FROM #Nwa WHERE NWA_ID IN (SELECT NWA_ID FROM #NwaZkc)
SELECT C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, C.NWA_ID, N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INTO #Contract FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA n INNER JOIN #SUBORGS org ON org.ORG_ID = N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.MICONTRACT C ON N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID WHERE (DATEDIFF(DAY, @Ac.vityDate, C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) >= 0 AND DATEDIFF(DAY, C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, @Ac.vityEndDate) >= 0)
SELECT DISTINCT n.NWA_ID INTO #ContractZkc FROM #Contract N INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA N_OLD ON N_OLD.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N_OLD.NWA_ID = (SELECT MAX(N2.NWA_ID) FROM NWA N2 WHERE N2.NWA_ID < N.Nwa_ID AND N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT C_OLD ON C_OLD.NWA_ID = N_OLD.NWA_ID WHERE C_OLD.DISCHARGE_CODE = 'ZKC' AND N_OLD.NWA_ID < N.Nwa_ID
--alter table #Contract --Add primary key (Nwa_Id)
--CREATE Index cai_contract_index ON #Contract (ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID)
-- Component Code is no longer excluded --DELETE FROM #Contract WHERE NWA_ID IN (SELECT NWA_ID FROM #ContractZkc)
--- GET CONTRACTS SELECT SO.ORG_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID, SO.LONG_NAME AS Recrui.ngOrgName, 1 AS ACTIVITY_TYPE, COUNT(C.NWA_ID) AS ACTIVITY_COUNT FROM #SUBORGS SO --LEFT OUTER JOIN NWA N ON SO.ORG_ID = N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN #CONTRACT C ON SO.ORG_ID = c.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID GROUP BY SO.ORG_ID, SO.LONG_NAME
UNION
--- GET NWAs SELECT SO.ORG_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID, SO.LONG_NAME AS Recrui.ngOrgName, 2 AS ACTIVITY_TYPE, COUNT(N.NWA_ID) AS ACTIVITY_COUNT FROM #SUBORGS SO LEFT OUTER JOIN #NWA N ON SO.ORG_ID = N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID GROUP BY SO.ORG_ID, SO.LONG_NAME ORDER BY SO.LONG_NAME, ACTIVITY_TYPE
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #SUBORGS DROP TABLE #Nwa DROP TABLE #Contract DROP TABLE #TempOrgList DROP TABLe #NwaZkc DROP TABLe #ContractZkc
END SET NOCOUNT OFF
